problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following statements is correct in regards to conditioning drills?<<
( ) Soldiers should perform no more than 10 repetitions of each exercise. ( ) conditioning drills do not have to be performed in any particular order. (x) For the most efficient instruction, the ideal size is one platoon. ( ) Speed should never be sacrificed for precise execution.
[explanation] For the most efficient instruction, the ideal unit size is one platoon. Larger units up to a battalion can successfully perform these drills if properly taught and mastered at the small unit level. [explanation]
